extensionDescription.message: Add-on for Thunderbird that automatically populates contact photos with their Libravatar or Gravatar photo.

extensionAuthor.description: Name of the author of the extension.

autoavatars.options.setup.message: The Preferred Instance option must be configured before this add-on will work. If you don't have a preference, press the Use Recommended Instance button to confirm you're happy to use the official instance hosted at libravatar.org.
autoavatars.options.setup.description: Instructions for getting started with the extension.

autoavatars.options.privacynotice.message: Whenever you create or update a contact, this add-on will make an outgoing network request to your preferred instance to check for an avatar.
autoavatars.options.privacynotice.description: Privacy notice that clarifies that we will connect to an external server whenever we fetch an avatar.

autoavatars.options.heading.description: Heading leading up to the actual options.

autoavatars.options.preferredinstance.description: Label for preferred instance text field, accepts a URL.

autoavatars.options.userecommended.description: Button to use the recommended Libravatar instance.

autoavatars.options.disabled.description: Name of the option to disable federation or default avatars.

autoavatars.options.defaultavatar.description: Label for the default avatar select field.

autoavatars.options.avatarstyle.404.description: Name of the option to disable default avatars.

autoavatars.options.bulkactions.description: Heading for the array of buttons for bulk operations.

autoavatars.options.applytoallcontacts.description: Name of the button to add avatars for all of the users contacts.

autoavatars.options.learnmore.description: Link to learn more about each preference, redirects to the GitLab documentation.
